title: Ayaz expresses grief over passing of former AJK Minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 14 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed profound sorrow over the demise of senior Pakistan Muslim League (N) leader and former Minister of the Government of Azad Jammu & Kashmir, Raja Naseer Ahmed Khan.
In his condolence message, Ayaz Sadiq paid rich tribute to late Raja Naseer Ahmed Khan for his outstanding political and social services.
He said that Raja Naseer was a sincere, seasoned and principled political leader who always upheld the values of public service and democratic integrity.
The Speaker remarked that Raja Nasir’s passing is an unparalleled loss, not only for his family but also for the political landscape of the country. “The void created by his departure is immense and irreplaceable,” he added.
He said that the late Raja Naseer Ahmed Khan’s legacy of wisdom, dedication and commitment to public welfare will be remembered for years to come.
Expressing heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family, Ayaz Sadiq said that in this hour of grief, his thoughts and prayers are with them.
Ayaz Sadiq prayed to Almighty Allah to grant the departed soul a high rank in Jannat-ul-Firdous and to bestow patience and strength upon his family to bear this irreparable loss.
